reviews.review: Я бедный дед Билли, я держу свою ферму уже 70 лет, досталась мне ферма от моего отца. Каждую ночь какие-то пьяные малолетки лазят ко мне. Они пытаются завести генераторы, которые мой прадед заводил, как я полёз в генераторы сразу током ударило! Ну сумашедшие! Приходится пугать их бензопилой и вешать на крюк что-бы протрезвели. Слышу опять какие-то шорохи...

鯖７キラー３ほどの割合でやっています。確かに今まで鯖は有利な状況ではありました。でもそれはパーティーをVCPTを組んでいる場合時くらいです。私はソロでやっているので現状とても鯖が厳しいし鬼ごっこではなくかくれんぼをさせたいのなら索敵のパークをナーフしてほしい。開発者の意図が全く分からない　ただキラーを強くしただけで心理戦のようなものがなくなってきている　それとランクリセットが頻繁に起きるから実力に見合わない相手と戦うことになると思うもっとランク上げにピップを増やしてもいいと思う　それとこれから購入する人は本当によく考えて買ったほうがいい。　現状サバイバー側はPTを組んでいる前提にキラーが強化されているのでキラーに興味がないと最初からサバイバーやるとあんまり楽しめないかもしれない。　やるならキラーで少しずつ慣れていったほうが楽しめます。また最初はサバイバーを1人やれれば上出来だと思います。
屠夫？狗都不玩

游戏确实挺好玩的，都说版本人类削弱了，确实这削弱的人类对萌新来说基本就是开局被挂了之后直接拔线，没有任何游戏体验，游戏中之间不能相互交流，也只有玩得久一些的人类才会去救人，所以这个版本对萌新来说确实惨，当然屠夫强势了不少，但是匹配一局需要10几分钟最多到半小时，好不容易匹配到人了开局刚挂个人就秒拔线，接着2个、3个都拔线了，人没了游戏体验，屠夫又何尝会有？人都没了屠夫找谁去，最后下来玩的时间还没有匹配的时间长，虽然玩的不久差不多是这样了，其实设计组应该多为萌新想想这样刚玩的人就更好的适应，和接触这游戏，不然刚玩就被秒挂，丝毫没有游戏体验，那又有谁会来玩这款游戏，只能形成玩家全部去玩屠夫去了，没人玩人类。这是个人想法，希望设计组可以多为萌新考虑一下，整体下来游戏很好玩，不然我也不浪费这么多时间还来写这个测评，希望玩这款游戏的人越来越多，给游戏一个好评。

Давно хотел написать отзыв о данной игре, и вот он. Ну-с начнём с того, что купил игру на релизе и застал всю ту кривость и сырость игры, слова разработчиков о том, что P2W не будет, а потом выпускают Майерса, который всех убивал. И ещё много можно рассказывать о былых временах, а обзор я пишу о нынешнем состоянии игры.  (МНОГА БУКАФ)
Введение.
Игра, которая представляет из себя игру 4vs1. Где есть команда выживших и маньяк. Выжившие должны сбежать с карты, но что бы сделать это им нужно чинить генераторы, помогать друг другу, лечить, ломать крюки, копаться в дряхлых сундуках в поисках аптечки или фонаря для ослепление маньяка и многое другое. Маньяк в свою очередь использует свои навыки, что бы убить выживших. По мере игры у вас будет рандомная прокачка за ОЧКИ КРОВИ, которые вы получаете за 1 сессию. Покупаете перки подношения и другое. Первые игр 5-10 вы точно будете в восторге от игры.
Минусы игры.
-Не самая лучшая коммуникация с коммьюнити. Игнор большинства сообщений на их же форуме. Из-за этого вышел не самый лучший патч, который сильно урезал выживших и  сильно поднял  маньяков. Потом об этом попозже.
-Баги. Самое уязвимое место в игре. Их много, очень много. Многие не значительные, но есть и очень мешающие играть.
-Читеры. Да они есть, но лично я встретил их от силы раз 5.
-Лаги. Разрабы до сих пор не могут с этим что-то сделать. Если маньяк решил скачать пару интересных фильмов для правой руки во время игры, то ждите, что он просто телепортируется к вам, даже если это не медсестра. 
-Однообразие. Тут кому как, если вам надоест чинить генераторы и убегать 100 часов подряд или же бегать за выжившими, то это игра не ваша. Если же вас особо не трогает, то можете приобрести.
+- Внутриигровой магазин и донат в целом. Сначала данная дичь меня взбесила, теперь вы можете купить 2 персонажей из 1 длс за  266 рублей, а в стиме можно купить за 175. Логика мне не понятна. Но теперь те, кто не хочет тратить на игру деньги могут купить себе персонажей за внутриигровую валюту играя в игру и повышая уровень. 
Больше минусов я не наблюдаю.
Плюсы игры
+Отличная атмосфера. В первых играх вы окажетесь в собственном слешере, где вы примите одну из сторон.
+Динамика происходящего. Игра может быть очень динамичной, когда маньяк гонится за вами и вы пытаетесь всеми силами убежать и обхитрить его.
+Частые патчи, не всегда удачные конечно. Теперь выжившим очень трудно играть и маньяки получают сильное преимущество и надеюсь это поправят.
+Интересный опыт игры с друзьями в данную игру, когда вы с друзьями кооперируетесь и пытаетесь обхитрить маньяка во время игры - это божественно.
+Сеттинг. 
UPD: +Контента стало достаточно для изучения и порции обновлений побольше.
Вывод: 
Игра не самая хорошая и на неё постоянно выливается тонны грязи и негатива. В каком-то смысле это даже оправданно. Но разработчики пытаются предложить нам что-то интересное с каждым длс. Пытаются менять геймплей, что бы он не застаивался, так же делают и RG со своим LoL. Лично игра меня очень затянула и наиграю в ней порядка 100-200 часов, игра развивается и не собирает останавливаться. 
Оценкой данной игры является ваше мнение.           
                                                                 Спасибо, что прочитали данный обзор и посчитали его полезным !

去年开始就入手了这游戏，一开始是看某主播玩，而且制作很用心的做了杨教授的中国屠夫才入坑的，一开始菜，没技能也还行，慢慢熟悉，虽然现在也菜，只是绿段，但是这次改版改的什么玩意。人类打击的BUG不修复，刷血点的不制裁，还在削人类，大幅加强屠夫。制作组到底有没有看过评价？现在绿段10局8个满配7个红处，打击打中的同时屠夫出刀根本下不来，安全板一砍再砍，翻车林总共几块安全板心里没点B数吗，有游戏体验吗？一个小白脸连着匹配到三局，三个红处+永三。说真的，现在打算入坑的萌新别入了，到处是BUG刷血点的，毫无游戏体验可言。
Muy entretenido y más con amigos. Quitando que muy rara vez puede tener algún "error", es divertido de jugar. 9/10

这款游戏的独特之处在于扮演杀手的玩家视角为第一人称视角，拥有强大的能力，还可以使用特殊能力来追踪逃亡者。而扮演逃亡者的四名玩家则是第三人称视角，可以更好地观察周遭环境。玩家在游戏中永远不知道下一步会发生什么，因此伴随着时时刻刻存在的恐惧来进行逃亡，玩家必须在强大的压力下做出残酷而正确的决定

New players out there looking to join, dont be fooled by these reviews the meta changed and people are butt hurt they have to change the way they play. the killer got stronger (what a shock the killer can actually kill people now 0.o) and the survivors get out of chase free cards have been limited. its in a strong state right now as far as balance goes this is coming from some one who mostly plays survive with friends

I don't normally write reviews, but in lue of all these fake negative reviews, I feel I should shed some light on why a bunch of people are crying (and for no good reason)

First off Dead By Daylight, is a fantastic game. Like any game that exists, there are bugs that are sometimes around. Some are large, some are small. I have over 600 hours and I have rarely encountered a bug that ruins my game so dratically. The dev team recently bought the right to their own game so updates are more prevalent now a days. So, like any game that has a multiplayer aspect, there are going to be some balance adjustments here and there. This game has been, and is STILL survivor sided. Since release the killers have been in a space  of being quite easy to manipulate due to surv buffs and most new killers getting not so good perks, while survivors get some pretty decent ones in return, that is my opinion though. The game, despite that, is still great to play. I have equal hours on surv and killer and between them both I do prefer killer (because I get more points usually), and I have dealt with loops, tea baggers, flashlights, all the things that made killer unfun. Killer has been very weak for a long time and NOW, recently, they finally gave some underpowered killers some meaningful buffs to put them in line a bit more, while nerfing the ability to run the killer around so easily. Both sides got some perk changes, and both sides benifited. 

Don't listen to all thse recent review bombers. They are mad because they have to actually TRY and lose the killer for once. I think they forget this is SUPPOSED to have the killer ve menacing. The killer is SUPPOSED to have an upperhand in the game. Thats the whole point of it being 4 v 1. Im pretty sure most people forget that. 

This game is great, and will be getting massive support over the coming year, with more balance changes and things for improvement. After 600 hours, maybe one hour, combined, has been spent being upset at some things in this game. Highly recommend it, so long as you can adapt. The only other thing is some people in here are....not very nice, very rude. The community is a mixed bag, but if u move from game to game, no need to worry about it.
Its a fun game but needs some more balancing. The exhaustion change was a good start.

Разрабы последним обновлением окончательно сломали баланс игры в пользу манов, сурвы за счет нерфов перков, палеток и фонарей имеют теперь значительно меньшие шансы на побег. Подъем манов на 1,5 секунды быстрее, бесполезные спринт и прочие перки с усталостью. RIP дбд, определенно не рекомендую до исправления баланса. Также манам точно не стоит удивляться поиску катки по 15-20 минут, с такими успехами "Pretty good job so far" разрабов сурвов будет становиться все меньше в самой игре.

Je ne recommande pas ce jeux encore moins si vous jouez seul, pour quel raison ? 

Tout simplement que c'est un jeux avec une communauté de merde et les devs n'ont pas l'air de vouloir faire quelques choses sur les problème de communauté qui rend le jeux plutôt frustrant et qui ne donne pas envie d'y jouer au bout de 3 games est encore c'est si vous êtes obstiné.

Tout simplement car les tueur vous full camp et full focus et je ne parle pas de vos coéquipiers qui ne vous aide pas (sauf si vous jouer en team), ou de vos alliées qui vont souvent déco de la game.

Je conseille seulement si vous voulez faire que du tueur mais lassant sur la longue ou si vous jouez en équipe de 5.

C'est encore le cas en 2021. Ah oui et la plupart des maj ajoute de nombreux bug comme la hitbox qui du jours au lendemain devient complètement n'importe quoi...

Dommage car le jeu peut être très fun quand vont tomber dans une bonne game mais c'est rare.

Many gamers complained after the last patch. I thought they probably exaggerated, so I played some rounds as survivor. To be honest, it was a really unpleasent experience. 
The game is designed arround the idea that survivors must repair generators to escape the killer, while the killer must catch them. Both as killer and survivor, you rely on visual as well as audible hints. Yet, some perks / skills you can equip your killer or survivor after some leveling, which will allow you to see the auras of your opponent/s for a short amount of time. Some killers have the ability to detect survivors (area of damage-attack for visual and audible hints; or being able to ambush the survivor). 
So the developpers decided that the chase is the game's core element and not the game of cat and mice, which it was before. Worse, with the recent patch you're sometimes unable to hear the killer approaching, and you will have to rely on two perks and/or visual hints. Sometimes you're out of the game without doing a single mistake, because one of the other survivors you're forced to play with messes up and the killer camps. 
While the game favored survivors before the patch, the patch rebalanced the game towards the killer, which was per se a necessity. Changes had to be made, because of the very agressive playstyle of some survivors, who adopted to the new game mechanic of chase, looping the killer and playing with their friends while using discord, thus destroying the game's balance.
Yet, after the patch, it is annoying to play as a solo survivor, while playing as a killer is more fun. Is this game good? No, because the developers' (admittingly hard) decisions are not well though through. Does this game rely on a very fun idea? Yes, I would love to play cat and mice once again. 
I would love to see the developers make some chances, such as to remove the ability to use discord while playing and to remove or alter unfun perks (decisive strike, barbecue and chilli, sprint burst). For the moment and after quite some hundred of hours, I decided to quit playing the game for the moment and to give it a bad rating, because I really think that the developers' ideas do not favor the game but alter it in a way the game is not benefitting from.

So... From a more critical point of view... Yes part of these negative reviews are due to the fact that killers were buffed, but saying that only that would make the game so bad is nonsense... The major problem is that the devs are REALLY stupid and they don't have a clue about what they are doing, they buff and nerf things that are far from being the main problems, therefore by doing so, they only make the real problems more anoying... Let me explain more clearly...
I just had a game (against a strong trapper, not that hard to be strong since it has been buffed), on that game none of the problems were about the power level itself of the killer, because we were playing a 3x1 because 1 survivor disconnected, making the game hard either way, and not helping the survivors at all (we don't even get a reward like quitter bonus like the killer), survivors receive no punishment WHATSOEVER when they harm their team by leaving the game, and the cherry on the top was the killer camping on a 3x1, like straight up camping, we all died from 1 hook cuz it was impossible to rescue (completly eliminating the reason why we play the game), and besides that, the ruin totem (a device that we need to deactivate to be able to survive) was probably near the hook, because we couldn't find it...

To sum it up... The devs don't know what they are doing and this is clear... They don't change the speed in which the gens are being done, they put totems, that brings inconsistency for the survivors AND the killers, making the game more RNG based (anoying type of RNG)... They don't change the fact that the killer is INCENTIVISED to camp because he is REWARDED for that, if not straight up face camp, at least a soft camping, like pretending he is not... So yeah boiz, the game is completly broken to the core, and the more the devs update it, the clearer it gets that they don't know what they are doing... It's downhill from here, so I REALLY don't advise anyone to buy it... If you want a multiplayer survival horror, wait for  Hide of Die that is coming up, because I'm only playing this DBD because there aren't many games of this genre... Anyways, THE GAME IS SHIT!!

If you enjoy the cheap thrill of something along the lines of: 
you're with your buddies after having some drinks and you decide to hit the movies to see the new B rated horror film with blood, action, and women screaming...
then have i got news for you!!
This game is exactly that, a cheap, clunky, unoptimized game that will make you hoot and holler from more than just the killer. Things like laggy servers, frame drops, d/c's, and much more are all right here at your fingertips. 
5/10 average horror game worth ~$10 bucks to keep you and the boys entertained for a couple of weekends.

Dead by Daylight is a game where 4 survivors have to repair 5 generators in order to power the exit gates and escape while a killer has to chase them down and kill them. The concept of this game was fun, but everything is so poorly executed that I suggest everyone, please don't waste your time on this game. Every patch comes with new bugs that make the game unplayable. When the devs release a new chapter they don't care if it is finished or not (last time I tried the new killer Twins out I couldn't use my power or switch back so I had to disconnect and get a 5min penalty), they just release it anyway bc they are bunch of money-hungry, arrogant, stubborn people. If steam had a Worst Developers award I would no doubt vote for Behaviour.

They tend to make changes that no one asked for and ignore the elephant in the room. No one asked for UI change but they did it anyway even though most people gave negative review to the UI change. Their dedicated servers have stolen so many grabs from killers (last time when I grabbed a survivor I couldn't hook her or drop her but my movement speed was slowed down and I couldn't use my power for the rest of the game as if she was still on my shoulder, and I could hear the sound of her healing herself and repairing generators in my ears), which is a problem since the game moved on to dedicated servers last year but 2 weeks ago when I played this game the issues still existed. Apart from that, they also decided to buff We're Gonna Live Forever before No mither when No mither is literally the most useless survivor perk in the game. You get the idea. Their priorities make no sense. They don't fix their bugs. They just keep pushing out new chapters and skins because these are what bring them money. They don't care about player experience.

Balancing, perk/power changes and reworks are terrible. I started playing Dead by Daylight in 2018, and back then the perk No One Escapes Death needed to be tier3 to grant you the ability to one hit down survivors when exit gates are powered. It's just a boring and unfair perk that rewards killers for doing poorly in terms of protecting their generators. In an ideal situation, you should pressure survivors off generators and keep them busy enough so that they don't get to finish all generators. But the devs, for some reason, decided to buff this perk. They are rewarding people who play badly. Same with survivors, they have too many second chance perks (Decisive Strike and Unbreakable) and item add-ons that allow them to get away with doing stupid or cheeky things. When they misplay they can just press the E key and prolong the chase for another minute or more. Now that the devs have nerfed Hex: Ruin (a perk that defends generators), a match can end in around 3 minutes if the survivors are efficient in doing objectives. I guess that's why they thought buffing NOED was a good idea. Did I mention that queue time in this game is also terrible? Imagine waiting 10 minutes for a 3 minute game. And the ranks of your teammates and/or opponent are 14 higher/lower than yours. That's the gameplay you're getting.

I can rant on and on about how bad this game is. It has way too many problems. But the worst one has to be the devs. They clearly don't play their own game so they know nothing about it. they have no idea what is healthy for the game and what will break it. Pre-nerfed Mettle of Man clearly shows that the devs don't think before they add something to the game. And the fact that Huntress Lullaby no longer affects the Doctor's snap out skill checks just makes me believe that the devs nerfed it simply because they themselves couldn't hit skill checks. And they don't test things before releasing. Even if they did have the players test it out, just like the UI change, they would still do it anyway. Only god knows what this company is thinking. And they are very proud of how people are still playing this game even though they keep making bad changes. 

Just like the game director of Dead by Daylight once said, "go play something else."

今回のアプデでサバイバー（生存者）がやや不利というか当然の修正がされました。
以前は、走ってる間でも疲労状態が回復されるというなんとも矛盾した状態でしたが、それがなくなりキラー（殺人鬼）側とのバランス修正を運営が意識しているのではないかと思います。
また、キラー側も弱いと言われているハグなどの固有能力やアドオンを強化し、偏った強キラーだけではなく、様々なキラーが楽しめるようになったのではないかと思います。
批判レビューを見るとサバイバーに不利なった点を強く主張しているように思います。
ニコニコ動画やYouTube等にも動画がたくさんありますので、全ての意見を鵜呑みにするのではなく、気になった方は目を通して購入を考えたほうが良いかもしれません。
Survivor Mains mad

Its totally enjoyable, i mean yea, there may be a toxic community, but instead of being toxic as well u just could make fun of them, making them more salty, believe me its gonna make u feel so good when some1 is toxic and u say "Oh, i love salty survivor, moore salt please" and they`ll be like super frustated and u can also leave the lobby and make`em even more frustrated, i mean we all are salty sometimes, even the most calm person in the world, but that`s the beautiful part of the game, it makes u wanna be better and better with every match. I totally recommend this game if u wanna have some fun, with or without friends to play with. But be careful though, the game creates addiction! LMAO, ENJOY THE GAME LADS!
ボイスチャット勢とキラーの強さの比は良くなったと思うけど野良のサバイバー対キラーだとキラーが下手でない限り圧倒的に優勢。野良だと連携も取れず、チェイス苦手な人もいる。そういった面を考慮してもサバイバー弱体化、キラーの強化はいいと思うが少しやりすぎかな、、、。しかもキラーいざやってみるとランク２０帯マッチングしないから初心者がサバイバーしかでえきない現状ｗｗ

非要人类溜到屠夫退游戏，我不说所有人，但是很多玩人类很没用素质，在靠着弹射和手电搞的屠夫难受的时候，来回蹲起嘲讽屠夫，搞的屠夫想要拔线，这次更改主要消弱了弹射和收手电，还有人们一直说夹子强什么的，那只是高配，低配我觉的并没有，说实话这个游戏人类玩家比较多，有意思我承认，但是因为这个就把制作组骂的制作组，你们觉的合适吗，这个游戏非要人类耍的屠夫团团转才可以吗
开黑的有多少，给屠夫点活路好吗，这次改动不是不能玩，一部分人都是跟风骂，好好感受一下行吗，
我建议不是消弱人类，而是改变匹配屠夫的机制，比如开黑人数而提高匹配的屠夫的段位，这个比较公平，比若4个15段匹配的屠夫是10段的，不要这样欺负萌新屠夫了号码
这是我个人的见解，不喜勿喷，求你们别这样喷了
这版本改的都匹配不到人类了，你加强屠夫也要有个度吧?

2018年サマーセールにて購入した新参者です。
スキルチェックが苦手で仲間にあまり迷惑をかけたくないという思いからキラー専門でプレイしています。

他の方も書いているようにサバイバー側からの煽りをかなり受けている印象があります。
私自身があまりうまくないためサバイバー側にとってはいいおもちゃになっているのでしょう。
プレイ後の結果発表フェーズにてサバイバー側のパークを見てみると、4つ装備全Lv3は当たり前で、それに対してこちらはありあわせのパーク詰め込のため最初は不公平感をすごく感じていましたが常態化していたためすぐに慣れました。
逃げるのがうまいな、と感じたサバイバーの装備パークを見ることも上達には必要だと考えているのですが、そう感じたサバイバーから「ez game」だの「thx noob」だと言われるとかなり悲しくなります。
幸いなことパークは画面左、チャット欄は画面右下に分かれて表示されるため、意識して右下を見ないようにすると精神的負担がかなり軽減します。
とはいえうまく勝てたときはやはりPvPゲームでしか味わえない達成感があり、1ゲームが長くとも15分前後で終わるので、寝る前の数プレイはかなり楽しんでいます。
煽られて不快に感じることもありますが、白熱した勝負の結果、最後に「gg」と言われることもあり、その時は胸が熱くなります。
これがあるからチャット欄をついついちら見してしまう毎日。後生だから煽らないで…！
